news.title: Zirakpur civic body collects over Rs 22 crore property tax in FY25
news.para: Executive officer Ashok Patharia said, "The council received Rs 27 lakh in cash and Rs 18 lakh through cheques on March 31 alone, taking the day's total collection to over Rs 45 lakh.

news.title: Lucknow civic body records 36% rise in property tax collection in FY 2024-25
news.para: According to LMC officials, property taxpayers increased from 4.16 lakh in last financial year to 5.05 lakh in 2024-25, comprising 4.33 lakh residential and 72,108 commercial properties.

news.title: Nagpur civic body falls short of Rs ₹325 crore property tax target
news.para: Despite implementing an ambitious amnesty scheme to recover outstanding dues, the property tax department collected ₹306 crore, achieving 94% of its target of ₹325 crore.

news.title: US construction spending surges 0.7% in February amid declining mortgage rates
news.para: The Commerce Department's Census Bureau said on Tuesday that construction spending jumped 0.7 per cent after a downwardly revised 0.5 per cent decrease in January.

news.title: Noida authority registers 18,405 flats in FY25
news.para: AIG (stamp and registry) B S Verma said the department set an annual revenue target of Rs 4,880 crore and collected 86% of the amount.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh government extends two-year zero-period benefit to 15 builders
news.para: The waiver is among the several recommendations proposed by a UP govt panel, led by former NITI Aayog CEO Amitabh Kant, to address stalled real estate projects in Noida.

news.title: Over 95% of Agartala smart city project completed: Tripura CM
news.para: CM Saha shared this while replying to a calling attention notice moved by MLA Gopal Chandra Roy on Tuesday, the last day of the Budget Session.

news.title: Bombay HC says arbitration act can’t be used as a plea to remove tenants
news.para: The tenants were occupants of closed garages on the same plot as a society building but were "distinct and separate from the building in question" and not members of the society.

news.title: Maharashtra government to deploy drones to survey land & high-rise buildings
news.para: The pre-monsoon inspection aims to ensure safety and structural integrity, particularly in areas prone to wear and tear from heavy rains.

news.title: Gurugram civic body collects Rs 240 crore property tax in FY25
news.para: According to data, the corporation collected Rs 240 crore as property tax, meeting 80% of its projected revenue of Rs 300 crore for the last fiscal year.

news.title: Mumbai: BMC mulls 13% hike in property taxes
news.para: The last property tax revision was expected in 2020 but the pandemic, and the political upheaval in the state in 2022, and then Lok Sabha and assembly elections in 2024 deferred it.

news.title: Mumbai: BMC collects property tax of Rs 6,198 crore in FY25
news.para: The country's richest civic body had set itself a target of collecting property tax of Rs 6,200 crore, and succeeded in collecting 99.97 percent of the amount, it said.

news.title: SC upholds Piramal Capital & Housing Finance's resolution plan for DHFL
news.para: The apex court also dismissed various appeals including one by former promoter Kapil Wadhawan, challenging the resolution plan on the grounds that Piramal acquired the Rs 90,000-crore company for just Rs 37,000 crore.

news.title: New Delhi: NDMC collects Rs 1,045 crore property tax in FY25
news.para: Till March 30, 2025, the council had collected Rs 1,045 crore. After the system updates payments received till March 31, the total collection is expected to reach Rs 1,050 crore, according to officials.

news.title: Gurugram: OCs of 750 more homes in DLF areas to be revoked for flouting building code
news.para: The move follows previous actions where DTCP already sought OC cancellations of 1,588 houses, bringing the total number of properties under scrutiny to 2,431.

news.title: Three more cases filed against Ansal API in Lucknow
news.para: While a woman accused the company of defrauding her of Rs 6.15 crore in the name of investment in land, two other persons alleged that they were defrauded of about Rs 50 lakh in the name of plots and flats.

news.title: Home-buyers in Karnataka seek CBI probe as 2,678 projects remain incomplete
news.para: According to the K-RERA website, a whopping number of housing projects’ completion dates have expired. The K-RERA website stated that 2,678 housing projects failed to complete as per the schedule.

news.title: Ready reckoner hike to prompt developers, societies to rework redevelopment pacts
news.para: The increase in ready reckoner rates by the Maharashtra government is influencing realty developers and housing societies in Mumbai and Thane to reassess redevelopment contracts. With redevelopment activities surging, the rise in rates necessitates renegotiations to manage escalating costs and ensure financial viability.

news.title: ED attaches Rs 395 crore assets of Three C Shelters, promoters in Gurugram
news.para: Additionally, equity shares worth Rs 108 crore in G4S Secure Solutions (India) Pvt Ltd — linked to another promoter Vidur Bharadwaj — have also been attached by ED's zonal office.

news.title: Rocket Companies to buy Mr Cooper Group for $9.4 billion
news.para: Better home inventory and recent declines in long-term bond yields are bringing back potential buyers to the housing market after years of struggle due to high interest rates and prices.
